welcomeSection.heading: Welcome to Our Center
welcomeSection.subheading: A Beacon of Faith, Knowledge, and Community
welcomeSection.description1: Markaz Bazil al-Khair Islamic Center is a beacon of faith, knowledge, and community service. Established to serve the Muslim community and beyond, we strive to promote Islamic values, education, and social harmony.
welcomeSection.description2: Our center offers daily prayers, Quran classes, educational programs, and community outreach initiatives. We welcome people from all backgrounds to learn, grow, and connect in a peaceful and inclusive environment.
